metadata.title: CVE-2023-51042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.4.12, amdgpu_cs_wait_all_fences indrivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/amdgpu_cs.c has a fence use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
